page.title: 20A DAY IN MY LIFE.SAM KELLY 6
page.content: The birds in my loft wake me up in the morning and sometimes my watch wakes me.I put on my shorts a shirt and a jumper and trainers and socks.When I go down to breakfast I mostly have toast and marmalade and a cup of tea. I brush my hair and pack my bag and go to the bus_stop and get on the school bus.When I get to school,I hang my coat on my peg then I walk up the coridoor and to the class.I do my news and my number work until dinner time.I mostly have a burger and a bun.After dinner we go out to play for 1 hour,I like to play football or in the sand pit.After playtime we go swimming and I do a length with a float!Then we get dressed and go back to class we put up our chairs and we sit down for a story Then we say our prayers and get our coats.I get the bus which takes me home and then I go out to play.
